nodes.text: Keshians were a sentient species nearly identical to humans. The only visible distinction between the two were the Keshians' eyes, which were large and oddly colored, allowing them to detect a broad spectrum ranging from ultraviolet to infrared. Keshian Iolo Arana, a New Republic pilot, used this to his advantage in dogfights.
Keshians first appeared in Before the Awakening, a junior novel written by Greg Rucka and published in 2015.
